oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Schools; Rural schools; Playgrounds; Seesaws; Swings; Sliding boards
Education - Tennessee; Education - History - Tennessee; School buildings - Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Front view of Milan Elementary School in Gibson County. Playground equipment occupies the front lawn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee Department of Education Schoolhouse Photos, 1938-1942
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This facility for the education of white children had an enrollment of 409 students for 1940. Principal J. P. Bradberry oversaw fourteen teachers and thirteen classrooms. The school housed an auditorium and gymnasium.
